Katie Price was spotted hitting saucy high street underwear store Ann Summers with her beau Kris Boyson on Friday.

The mother-of-five, 41, who was recently rated a 1/10 in the bedroom by ex Charles Drury , seemed in the mood to spice up her things in the bedroom by splurging on racy goodies from the store that sells lingerie and sex toys.

The former glamour model was seen carrying the shops iconic black and hot pink paper bag which was stuffed with tissue paper to conceal the sexy treats.

After she enjoyed splashing the cash, the bombshell was seen at a cash machine next to Kris who was casually-clad in a khaki hooded sweater and tracksuit bottoms.

He toted his own shopping bag from sports retailer JD.

(Image: BACKGRID)

Katie put on an equally as relaxed look in black leggings that featured fishnet detailing teamed with a jumper and trainers.

The star seemed happy to burn the plastic despite possibly being made bankrupt by Christmas after allegedly failing to keep up with her monthly payments.

The star is being pursued by creditors and entered into a Individual Voluntary Agreement over her estimated £250,000 debts to the High Court.

(Image: BACKGRID)

(Image: BACKGRID)

Katie and Kris' day at the shops comes after she was recently dumped by toyboy lover Charles, 22.

Since the end of their relationship, builder Charles has made a string of explosive statements about his and Katie's brief courtship.

Charles claims that on the first night they met, they binged on drugs and drink before sleeping together hours later in a cocaine-fuelled romp.

(Image: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

He also believes she cheated on him during their fling, but she would never admit to it.

Their relationship came to an end when Charles saw pictures of her leaving Kris' house.

Katie previously admitted to taking cocaine weekly for six months as she struggled to cope with her mum's terminal illness and ex husband Kieran's cheating.

She had checked into rehab and was treated for trauma and depression.
description: The former glamour model treated herself to some goodies from the racy store
